name: worthlessness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the feeling or fact of not being important or useful: People who have been abused as children often experience feelings/a sense of worthlessness. She started to sound off about the worthlessness of most television.
the fact of having no financial value: Shares in the company collapsed to worthlessness. The insurance company has acknowledged the worthlessness of critical illness cover. See
worthless
More examplesFewer examplesShe had let her ex-husband convince her of her worthlessness.Anyone can have a valid opinion about the worth or worthlessness of art.Government bonds collapsed to the point of worthlessness.This process is repeated millions of times, compounding the worthlessness of every pound in the economy each time it happens.
